posts.author: trebusze
posts.content:
Hello guys.

I'm looking to play this awesome module, Eye of the Beholder (enhanced edition) for the 1st time. It is supposed to take one for a journey of levels 1-40.
Just wandering if anyone have played this mod and could recommend some good character builds? As i can see from the screen shots, there is going to be whole loads of undead so making a Weapon Master isn't the best idea because i won't benefit much from those super duper critical hits, right? 
Anyway thanks and sorry for my English :)


Link for the mod in case someone doesn't know: https://neverwintervault.org/project/nw ... e-beholder
